property.name: focalPointX
property.label: Focal point X
property.description: X coordinate of the focal point.

property.name: focalPointY
property.label: Focal point Y
property.description: Y coordinate of the focal point.

property.name: srcSet
property.label: Src set
property.description: HTML srcSet or, if Src set query string is set, source set in JSON array format {size, height, other_parameters}.

property.description: Pass a custom HTML image sizes attribute value - one will be calculated based on the src set and bps if left blank.
